topic.title: 애견 미용실에 처음 방문하여 스타일 상담하기
topic.description: 애견 미용실에 처음 방문하여 반려견의 미용 스타일에 대해 상담하고 예약하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 오늘 처음 방문했어요. 저희 강아지 미용 상담 좀 받을 수 있을까요?
물론이죠! 어떤 스타일을 생각하고 계신가요? 특별히 원하시는 스타일이 있으세요?
음, 여름이라서 털을 좀 짧게 깎고 싶어요.
알겠습니다. 얼굴 모양은 동그랗게 남겨드릴까요? 그게 요즘 유행하는 스타일이거든요.
네, 좋은 생각이에요! 그렇게 하면 얼마나 걸릴까요?
보통 2시간 정도 걸려요. 오늘 바로 예약하시겠어요?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, this is my first time here. Could I get a consultation for my dog's grooming?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | this is my first time here. || Could I get a consultation | for my dog's grooming?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course! What style are you thinking of? **Is there a particular style you have in mind**?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course! || What style | are you thinking of? || **Is there a particular style | you have in mind**?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Well, since it's summer, **I'd like to get his fur cut short**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Well, | since it's summer, | **I'd like to get his fur cut short**.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay. Should I leave the face shape round? Because **that's a popular style these days**.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Okay. || Should I leave the face shape round? || Because **that's a popular style | these days**.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, that sounds great! How long will it take?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | that sounds great! || How long | will it take?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: It usually takes about two hours. **Would you like to book an appointment for today**?
